title: XBRL monetaryItemType
description: The monetary type serves as the datatype for those financial concepts in a taxonomy which denote units in a currency

currency.$comment: References ISO currencies as defined in the XBRL 2.1 specification. The XBRL Units Type Registry (UTR) also defines monetary units with additional XBRL-specific metadata and status (REC/CR). For general XBRL usage, this ISO reference is appropriate. For strict regulatory compliance or XBRL-specific unit validation, use the UTR unit schema as an additional validation layer
